title: game crashes/bug splats everytime i attempt to load into a game
body: jus got a new monitor. worked fine minutes before replacing old monitior now crashes after champ select everytime. have tried everything in the support articles and my ticket idk if its even being looked at. its been 8 hours

replies.body:
Generally a support ticket is a 18-42 hour wait depending on how busy Riot is. I sent a ticket the other day and got a message saying their wait time was a little longer than normal.

What kind of crash are you talking about? Are you actually getting the bugsplat notification? or is it the windows "Stopped responding" popup?

 I have this weird issue where when the loading screen starts all the portraits are blank for 10-20 seconds and if I click around during this time I get the not responding message. All I do is click "Wait for program..." and it eventually loads as normal. I don't recall when this first started happening to me but it does it every game. I also got a new monitor some time ago so that could be the issue. 

Because you got a new monitor I imagine it has to do with your in-game visual settings. You might want to try swapping back to the old monitor to see if it still works. Otherwise maybe try changing your video settings to accommodate the new monitor.

Hope this helped!
{{summoner:4}}
It is actually giving me the bug splat message. I have yet to try the old monitor again. I will try that now. Thanks!

Since you've already submitted a support ticket with system logs, I recommend waiting for a tech specialist to get back to you. Since they have logs, they'll have more context as to what could be causing this.

We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so response times will be a bit higher than normal. Let me know if you have any questions.
